gobblin.metrics

Class Counters<E extends Enum<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.Counters<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - 

    public class Counters<E extends Enum<E>>
extends Object
    Class that holds Counters for each value of an enum. The metric generated with have the name of the enum.
    See Also:
    initialize(MetricContext, Class, Class)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Counters()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Counters

        public Counters()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(MetricContext metricContext,
                       Class<E> enumClass,
                       Class<?> instrumentedClass)
        Creates a Counter for every value of the enumClass. Use inc(Enum, long) to increment the counter associated with a enum value
        Parameters:
        metricContext - that Counters will be registered
        enumClass - that define the names of Counters. One counter is created per value
        instrumentedClass - name that will be prefixed in the metric name

      • inc

        public void inc(E e,
                long n)
        Increment the counter associated with enum value passed.
        Parameters:
        e - Counter to increment.
        n - the value to increment

      • getCount

        public long getCount(E e)
        Get count for counter associated with enum value passed.
        Parameters:
        e - Counter to query.
        Returns:
        the count for this counter.
